bpp/descriptor.name: Squadcube
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: Squadcube is a seller platform that enables multiple sellers to list and sell their products on the ONDC network.
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Squadcube is a comprehensive seller platform designed to empower businesses to seamlessly list and sell their products on the ONDC (Open Network for Digital Commerce) network. By connecting sellers with a wide-reaching digital marketplace, Squadcube helps facilitate greater visibility and reach for their products while ensuring a smooth and efficient online selling experience. The platform supports multiple sellers, offering a collaborative space for them to showcase and manage their offerings within the growing ONDC ecosystem.

descriptor.name: Mama Earth
descriptor.short_desc: Mama Earth is a beauty & personal care store offering products through the ONDC platform online.
descriptor.long_desc: Mama Earth is a beauty & personal care store that offers a wide range of products online through the ONDC platform. Customers can conveniently explore and purchase items from the store through this innovative digital marketplace.

descriptor.name: Variant Group - 1
Variant Group - 2
Variant Group - 3
Mamaearth Perfume Gift Set of 4 for Men and Women
descriptor.short_desc: Mamaearth Perfume Gift Set of 4 for Men and Women, code : 1000
descriptor.long_desc:
Embark on a sensorial adventure with the Mamaearth Eau De Parfum - Set of 4 that has a fragrance for every mood! Whether youΓÇÖre all about an adventurous journey to the deep & dark mystical woods or want to feel the thrill of surfing along the waves, this set has all this and much more! WhatΓÇÖs more, this makes for the perfect gift too! Now, letΓÇÖs dive into all the enchanting scents in this set. 

For Him:

Into the Woods: Embrace the spirit of adventure with Geranium, Rose, and Oud Wood, creating a rich and captivating scent for the bold and daring man.

Into the Waves: Dive into freshness with Bergamot, Aquatic, and Musk, delivering crisp & clean notes for a refreshing escape!
For Her:

Into the Valley: Delight in the exotic blend of Pear, Jasmine, and Vanilla, offering a floral and sweet fragrance that transports you to a floral wonderland.
Into the Sunset: Savor the vibrant citrusy notes of Grapefruit, Tangerine, and Peony, perfect for an uplifting and radiant evening scent.
This perfume set is dermatologically tested and Made Safe Approved, which makes it perfectly safe to use on skin! The added convenience of the atomizer spray ensures better fragrance diffusion, enhancing your experience, every day!

descriptor.name: Nourishing Bathing Bar Soap For Kids
descriptor.short_desc: Nourishing Bathing Bar Soap For Kids, code : 1001
descriptor.long_desc:
Hi! I am Mamaearth Nourishing Bathing Bar Soap for kids. I am incredibly gentle on your kidsΓÇÖ skin while effectively cleansing and keeping bacteria & germs away. My fruity essence will make bath time an enjoyable experience, leaving behind fun-filled memories. Loaded with Glycerin, Basil Oil, Coconut Oil & Almond Oil, I leave your childΓÇÖs skin soft, supple, moisturized & healthy. I come in five fruity flavors - Mango Bite, Strawberry Souffle, Apple Sorbet, Blueberry Blush, and Orange Bar. I make bath time fun time for your little munchkin!
I am dermatologically tested. I do not irritate delicate skin and I am safe for head to toe use. I am completely free of toxins like SLS, SLES, Silicones, and Paraben

descriptor.name: Onion Hair Oil with Onion Oil and Redensyl for Hair Fall Control
descriptor.short_desc: Onion Hair Oil with Onion Oil and Redensyl for Hair Fall Control, code : 1002
descriptor.long_desc:
Introducing your favorite Mamaearth Onion Oil with a new & improved formula for even stronger, smoother, and shinier hair. With an improved lightweight and non-sticky formulation and oh-so-good fragrance, itΓÇÖs time to welcome stronger and healthier hair with the time-tested goodness of Onion. 

Mamaearth Onion Hair Oil, rich in Sulphur, Potassium & antioxidants, reduces hair fall & accelerates hair regrowth. One of the newest breakthrough ingredients in hair growth, Redensyl, unblocks hair follicles & also boosts new hair growth. Safe for colored & chemically treated hair, the Oil is free of harmful chemicals & toxins such as Silicones, Parabens, Mineral Oil, and Dyes.

And because of our no toxins and no harmful chemicals philosophy, you wonΓÇÖt find any Silicones, Parabens, mineral oil & dyes in our Onion Hair Oil.

descriptor.name: BhringAmla Shampoo and Conditioner Combo
descriptor.short_desc: BhringAmla Shampoo and Conditioner Combo, code : 1003
descriptor.long_desc:
Finally, a shampoo and conditioner combo you can trust. Our BhringAmla duo comes with the goodness of 14 herbs. It reduces dandruff & hair fall, repairs damaged hair, and makes it flaunt-worthy!
BhringAmla Oil in the Shampoo and Conditioner is crafted according to an ancient Ayurvedic process called the ΓÇÿKshirpak VidhiΓÇÖ. ΓÇÿKshiraΓÇÖ or milk is boiled with herbs like Bhringraj, Amla, Brahmi and Shikakai - that are then distilled and mixed with potent natural oils. ItΓÇÖs a process thatΓÇÖs time-taking, exhaustive but extremely effective. This combo is a tested and proven blend of traditional herbs for reduced hair fall, dandruff, graying and lustrous, smooth and strong hair.
Suitable for all hair types and safe for colored and chemically treated hair, this Shampoo and Conditioner Combo is free of harmful chemicals & toxins such as Silicones, Parabens, Mineral Oil, & Dyes.

descriptor.name: Onion Beard Oil with Onion and Redensyl For Beard Growth - 30 ml
descriptor.short_desc: Onion Beard Oil with Onion and Redensyl For Beard Growth - 30 ml, code : 1004
descriptor.long_desc:
Beard Goals here we come! Crafted with the natural goodness of Onion and Redensyl, Mamaearth Onion Beard Oil is all you need for growing your beard and grooming it to perfection.
A time-tested natural ingredient, Onion is rich in Sulphur that increases blood supply to the hair follicles, which leads to healthier beard growth. The Redensyl present in the oil improves hair density, thickness, strength and the Argan Oil combined with Vitamin E keeps it nourished, giving you a softer and smoother beard.
Along with being super effective, our Beard Oil is also non-sticky and quick-absorbing leaving you with a beard that grows without the grease. The best part is that the Onion Oil For Beard is Made Safe Certified, thus it is extremely safe and free of toxins, Silicones, Parabens and other harmful chemicals.
ThatΓÇÖs not all! The Onion Beard Oil comes with a specially crafted wooden comb to stimulate blood flow and distribute the beard oil evenl

descriptor.name: Green Tea Under Eye Patches with Green Tea and Collagen for Puffy Eyes - 30 Pairs (60 Pieces)
descriptor.short_desc: Green Tea Under Eye Patches with Green Tea and Collagen for Puffy Eyes - 30 Pairs (60 Pieces), code : 1005
descriptor.long_desc:
Puffy & tired under eyes making you lose sleep? Refresh & depuff your under eyes in an instant with the all-new Mamaearth Green Tea Under Eye Patches. Crafted with the goodness of Green Tea & Collagen, these patches reduce puffiness and freshen up your under eyes on the go!
Green Tea is rich in antioxidants & helps minimize dark circles, swelling and puffiness. Collagen hydrates skin, improves elasticity, and smoothens under eye skin to help you give an uplifted and well-rested appearance. The best part? These patches come infused with a cooling serum that soothes & brightens the under-eye area. So, whether you're looking to unwind at home or want to rejuvenate your under eyes on the go, our Green Tea Under Eye Patches are your go-to for that instant boost of freshness & hydration!
And these patches are Made Safe certified, which means no toxins, only natureΓÇÖs goodness for your under eye

descriptor.name: Ubtan Face Mask with Saffron and Turmeric for Skin Brightening and Tan Removal - 100g
descriptor.short_desc: Ubtan Face Mask with Saffron and Turmeric for Skin Brightening and Tan Removal - 100g, code : 1006
descriptor.long_desc:
Indulge in the age-old tradition of Ubtan and let it rejuvenate your face for a fresh, bright, flawless look. The goodness of Ubtan comprises Turmeric and Saffron ΓÇô two ingredients that are revered for offering a natural glow and removing suntan. The presence of Apricot Oil and Cucumber in the Ubtan Face Mask help exfoliate, soothe and reduce tan for a glowing look. It is suitable for all skin types and is free from harmful chemical

descriptor.name: Mamaearth Micellar Gentle Makeup Remover Wipes - 30Nos
descriptor.short_desc: Mamaearth Micellar Gentle Makeup Remover Wipes - 30Nos, code : 1008
descriptor.long_desc:
Struggling to remove that last bit of your waterproof eyeliner or lipstick that just wonΓÇÖt budge? Mamaearth Micellar Gentle Makeup Remover Wipes are here to save your day (and skin). IndiaΓÇÖs 1st Made Safe Certified wipes to remove makeup, these wipes are pH balanced and alcohol and fragrance-free. 

Powered with Micelles that go deep inside the pores and act like dirt magnets, our wipes are gentle on your skin while they cleanse and remove stubborn waterproof makeup. The icing on the cake? These wipes are infused with Aloe Vera, which soothes and calms, leaving your skin feeling fresh and hydrated. Dermatologically and Ophthalmologically tested, you need just one wipe for a makeup-free face.

And thereΓÇÖs more! The wipes are made with 100% biodegradable plant-based fabric and are Made Safe Certified, which means they are free of Silicones, Parabens, Mineral Oil, and dyes.

descriptor.name: Mamaearth Cocoa Rich Moisturizing Body Lotion with Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E for Intense Moisturization - 400 ml (Pack of 2)
descriptor.short_desc: Mamaearth Cocoa Rich Moisturizing Body Lotion with Cocoa Butter and Vitamin E for Intense Moisturization - 400 ml (Pack of 2), code : 1009-1
descriptor.long_desc:
Guess who just passed with full marks? 

Our all-new Cocoa Rich Moisturizing Body Lotion, the newest in the race to ace the moisturization test. ItΓÇÖs a classroom where dryness gets detention & radiant, healthy skin graduates with honors! 

From repairing dull & damaged skin to keeping it moisturized for up to 48 hours, the 7-in-1 Total Care Benefits of this formula takes care of everything. Transforming your skincare routine into a soothing ritual of exquisite care, Cocoa Rich Lotion leaves you with irresistibly soft, nourished skin - thanks to 100% natural butter. 

Perfect for very dry skin, the Cocoa Butter in the lotion helps lock in moisture, while Vitamin E & Glycerin prevent moisture loss, keeping the skin hydrated & plump at all times.

The best is yet to come - with Made Safe Approval, our Cocoa Rich Moisturizing Body Lotion promises a natural haven for nourished skin, banishing nasties like parabens, LLP, mineral oil and silicones. Simply pump, pamper, and glow!

descriptor.name: Multani Mitti Face Wash with Multani Mitti and Bulgarian Rose For Oil Control and Acne - 100 ml
descriptor.short_desc: Multani Mitti Face Wash with Multani Mitti and Bulgarian Rose For Oil Control and Acne - 100 ml, code : 1010
descriptor.long_desc:
Want the goodness of Multani Mitti in your skincare but without the hassle of mixing & waiting? We heard you! Meet Mamaearth Multani Mitti Face Wash which brings your favorite age-old skincare remedy for acne & oil control in an easy-to-use daily face wash.
Crafted with the goodness of Multani Mitti, the face wash gently cleanses your skin, removes excess oil & prevents acne. WhatΓÇÖs great is that the face wash doesnΓÇÖt dry the skin either. Infused with the goodness of Bulgarian Rose, the face wash hydrates your skin deeply.
Enriched with Niacinamide & Vitamin E, it also evens skin tone, controls oil production without leaving your skin dry or stretchy. The result? Clean, clear & hydrated skin minus the oil. But wait thereΓÇÖs more! Mamaearth Face Wash is also Made Safe Certified, which means it is free of toxins and harmful chemical

descriptor.name: Skin Correct Face Serum with Niacinamide and Ginger Extract for Acne Marks and Scars - 30 ml
descriptor.short_desc: Skin Correct Face Serum with Niacinamide and Ginger Extract for Acne Marks and Scars - 30 ml, code : 1011
descriptor.long_desc: Acne marks and scars are a concern for many people. Mamaearth Skin Correct Face Serum addresses these skin problems with its unique formulation. The combination of proven ingredients such as Niacinamide and Ginger Extract helps reduce acne scars and marks, minimizes enlarged pores, and improves overall skin texture. Niacinamide is a form of Vitamin B3+ and a well-demonstrated ingredient in skincare that balances natural sebum levels and prevents overproduction. As a potent antioxidant, Niacinamide serum reduces inflammation, evens out skin tone, and restores the skinΓÇÖs elasticity shrinking enlarged pores. Ginger Extract, on the other hand, is an antioxidant that prevents collagen degradation and stimulates melanin production to even out skin patches. It further helps in soothing the skin, preventing irritation due to acne. The serum is dermatologically tested and can be used on all skin types. The product has no harsh chemicals and is free of SLS, Parabens and Mineral Oils.
